ygData.subject: Re: Gimmee Gimmee!
ygData.msgSnippet: Slyde; Trust me, its not just Xegony- I was thinking the same thing on Bertoxx. I have never been harassed as much as I have in the last couple of months. I
ygData.messageBody:
Slyde;

Trust me, its not just Xegony- I was thinking the same thing on Bertoxx. I
have never been harassed as much as I have in the last couple of months. I
don't mind answering questions- that I will always do, but I have never
asked someone to give me money or equipment for no reason- that constitutes
whining :)-and i just hit "ignore". Sad, really, because I love to surprise
newbies by giving them some money or an item -I especially like the little
guys who buff me and ask for nothing- I realize they are practising, but
when they ask for or expect nothing in return, that's when being a nice guy
kinda makes you feel good- but now I try to avoid the big cities.

Scanna Swiftsinger
lvl 36
Bertoxx
-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman <fuzzbone@...>
To: EQ Bards <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, February 09, 2000 12:45 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Gimmee Gimmee!


>From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
>
> I'm not sure if it's given the "age" and popularity of the Xegony
>server; or perhaps the influx of XMas newbies with no understanding of the
>dynamics of the game; but it seems like the past couple months I seem to
>constantly get begs from new characters for me to give them stuff.
>
